verses.name: Lamentations 3:51
verses.text: Mine eye affecteth mine heart because of all the daughters of my city.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:52
verses.text: Mine enemies chased me sore, like a bird, without cause.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:53
verses.text: They have cut off my life in the dungeon, and cast a stone upon me.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:54
verses.text: Waters flowed over mine head; then I said, I am cut off.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:55
verses.text: I called upon thy name, O Lord, out of the low dungeon.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:56
verses.text: Thou hast heard my voice: hide not thine ear at my breathing, at my cry.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:57
verses.text: Thou drewest near in the day that I called upon thee: thou saidst, Fear not.
